function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increase in global inequality due to the pandemic","Impact":"Risks a global economic depression and increases poverty by 8%","Mitigation":"Reform economic policies to address inequality, provide social support to vulnerable populations","Technologies":"Social safety nets, economic reforms","People":"Global population, particularly those vulnerable to economic fluctuations","Owner":"International organizations, governments, policymakers"},{"Description":"Exposure of vulnerabilities caused by neoliberalism","Impact":"Rising socio-economic inequality and decline in labor income share","Mitigation":"Reform economic policies to address inequality, strengthen labor rights","Technologies":"Economic policy reforms, labor rights protection measures","People":"Workers, communities affected by economic policies","Owner":"Policy makers, trade unions, NGOs"}]}
